chapter.title: Preface
chapter.para: Weld-OSGi aims at simplifying the access to the OSGi environment by providing a more modern, more user-friendly and faster way to interact with the OSGi Framework. It adresses the OSGi complexity of services management using CDI specification (JSR-299). Thus it provides an CDI-OSGi extension with injection utilities for the OSGi environment. Moreover an integration with any CDI implementation, such as Weld, is possible through a standard bootstrapping API.

Weld-OSGi deals with many features like:
Global management using extender pattern with a infra bundle providing features to the entire application
Embedded modes to manage your own bundles, with various control policies, in classic OSGi application
Full annotation configuration following CDI model
Intra bundle CDI full support: injection, producers, interceptors, decorators ...
Services injection, with full support of requirement, ldap filtering and OSGi dynamism
Automatic services publication fully compatible with OSGi service registering system
Support for OSGi specific injection (such as bundle or manifest headers
Event notification and inter bundles communication
